Get a Proof of Identity
=======================

So far Proof of Identity are only delivered by Talao.


For individuals send an email through your authentification email to contact@talao.io with 2 pictures

	* your Identity Card or Passport
	* a selfie with your Identity Card or Passport in hand. We must see your face and Identy Card Picture.


For companies send an email through your authentification email to contact@talao.io.
